name: The Mighty Oak
description:
Our team which consists of myself and Aaron Joel Parker completed this game for the Gamedev.tv Game jam of 2022 around the theme "Death is only the beginning". I am excited to share with you our source code for the project at the following repository. We also included the sprites we made for this game.

Thanks to Jason Jones for the Promo and Logo artwork.
https://github.com/The-Secret-Bosses/Acorn
https://github.com/The-Secret-Bosses/sprites
